## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you discover a security vulnerability, please **DO NOT open a public issue**.  
Instead, please contact us directly at:

- ğŸ“§ Email: [your-email@example.com]
- ğŸ›¡ï¸ Telegram: [@yourusername](https://t.me/yourusername)

We take security issues seriously and will respond as quickly as possible to confirm the report and begin an investigation.

---

## Responsible Disclosure

We ask that you:

âœ… Share the details privately (do not publish or share until we fix it)  
âœ… Give us a reasonable amount of time to fix the issue  
âœ… Do not exploit the vulnerability beyond what is necessary to demonstrate it
